quote: Any noble cause will encounter its share of setbacks. The strength of that cause is measured in how the men who fight for it respond. We refuse to give up, which is why we will prevail eventually.
quote_letters: ANY NOBLE CAUSE WILL ENCOUNTER ITS SHARE OF SETBACKS THE STRENGTH OF THAT CAUSE IS MEASURED IN HOW THE MEN WHO FIGHT FOR IT RESPOND WE REFUSE TO GIVE UP WHICH IS WHY WE WILL PREVAIL EVENTUALLY
